title: How the Taliban engineered 'political collapse' of Afghanistan
content:
1. How the Taliban engineered 'political collapse' of Afghanistan  Reuters
  2. US officials found the body of an Afghan in the landing gear of a plane after it left Kabul, as hundreds tried to flee the Taliban by clinging to planes  Yahoo! Voices
  3. Afghanistan latest news as Taliban forces take control: Live updates  CNN
  4. Over 600 Afghans cram into U.S. cargo plane in desperate flight from Kabul  Reuters
  5. Photo shows a US Air Force cargo plane crammed with 640 Afghans trying to flee the Taliban  Yahoo News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
